subject: numeracy
learning_outcomes: Recall multiplication facts for small numbers and use repeated addition
Understand division as sharing and grouping
Work with simple fractions (1/2, 1/3, 1/4) using concrete examples
Measure length and mass using standard and non-standard units
Solve simple word problems involving the four operations in context
Collect and represent data using tally charts and simple pictograms
topics: Multiplication and division basics: repeated addition and sharing
Fractions: halves, thirds and quarters through practical activities
Measurement: units of length and mass, comparison and estimation
Data handling: tally charts, simple pictograms
Problem solving using multi-step reasoning in familiar contexts
